pageContext.claim: “But under the previous administration, this tank factory [in Lima, Ohio] -- the last of its kind anywhere in the Western Hemisphere -- came very close to shutting down. Four straight years, the number of U.S. tanks that were budgeted for upgrades was zero. Does anybody remember that? Raise your hands. Do you remember that? Zero. That was under your great President Obama. Our military readiness declined and your workforce was slashed by 60 percent. But those days are over.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Funding for the tank produced at this Ohio facility increased during the Obama administration.
